wblut.hemesh
Class HE_Selection

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.HE_Structure
      wblut.hemesh.HE_Selection

public class HE_Selection
extends HE_Structure

Collection of mesh elements. Contains methods to manipulate selections

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
